notes.text:
libmspack was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- Possible DoS by infinite loop (bnc#912214, CVE-2014-9556)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Integer overflow in the qtmd_decompress function in libmspack 0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang) via a crafted CAB file, which triggers an infinite loop.
notes.title: CVE description

recommended: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12:libmspack0-0.4-6.1.ppc64le
